label: 庸
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: a tax levied on individuals by the ritsuryô codes that was payable in cloth and other goods. Proceeds from it plus proceeds from the chô produce tax were to be sent to the capital to support government there. [律令] [調]
